scene.name: intro
scene.line: I'm glad you phoned. I was just thinking of you.
scene.option: Sorry I didn't call this week. I've been traveling constantly.
You're sitting by the phone waiting for my call? That's so nice.

scene.name: how-nice
scene.line: I was eating an early lunch, actually, and my mind was wandering.

scene.name: uncle
scene.line: I visited the hospital yesterday. I went to visit Uncle Andrius, but they moved him. Now he's in a hospice care facility run by some old Polish nun. Everyone says it's very ... "nice."
I asked them about visiting and they said he didn't want any visitors ...

scene.name: stubborn
scene.line: Yes, it's typical of Andrius. I was thinking, maybe ...

scene.name: right
scene.line: I guess it is, technically ... Clara, I don't think it's really what he wants.

scene.name: clara-visit
scene.line: If `you` came to visit, he would see you. All those afternoons you two would go drinking beers by the river ... Don't you think it would mean a lot to him if he could say goodbye to you in person?
scene.option: We must take him at his word.
Oh, Nadia. I'd never make it back in time anyway.

scene.name: at-his-word
scene.line: Maybe you know him better than I do, but ... I just don't believe anyone would really want to die alone.

scene.name: back-in-time
scene.line: It's true, you're a long way from home, Clara. I suppose it can't be helped.

scene.name: closing
scene.line: Oh, here's mother at the door. We're going to try again to see him. I hope the tour is going well. Love you. Be careful.
